article.title: Analysis of On-line Searching Costs
article.author: Robertson, S.E.Datta, S.
article.text: A project was undertaken to discover the major determinants of the costs of searching, on-line, on a practical reference retrieval system (SCISEARCH).. The methodology and some results of this project are reported.. Controlled searches were undertaken to isolate the effect of each of a number of variables.. A model involving several of the major variables was then developed.. The general approach proved to be (in this case) both feasible and useful..
